entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert for tiered compilation bg work available event #89749
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] ManagedToUnmanagedStubs with 'out' or return value size may not have correct size or array pointer when cleaning up #89747
  • Unable to run the wasi console template with UseArtifactsOutput=true #89744
  • CA1862 suggestion changing semantics of the comparison. #89740
    8.0.0
  • [AOT][Blazor][Net8] String.ToLower performance issue #89735
  • [AOT][Blazor][Net8] Performance issue in async code #89733
  • Configuration-binding source generator: Binding logic was not generated for a binder call #89732
    8.0.0
  • Enable JitStressRegs=0x800 to enable spillAlways #89731
    9.0.0
  • Feature Proposal: Const Generics #89730
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make AggregationManager public #89727
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Let accessing the instance of Exception (if any) on stack. #89724
  • Suboptimal codegen for Pairwise vector comparison #89722
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Provide an implementation AesGcm in Microsoft.Bcl.Cryptography #89718
  • System.NotImplementedException in ComWrappers.TryGetOrCreateObjectForComInstanceInternal on NativeAOT #89713
  • Uri.MakeRelativeUri ignores query of base URI #89708
  • Test failure System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest #89702
  • Test failure GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback_Svr/Callback_Svr.sh #89701
  • [wasm][debugger] NRE seen in proxy when loading symbols from symbol server #89700
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Dynamic PGO Microbenchmark Regressions #87194
    8.0.0
  • Regression in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Get.GetDateTime #84228
    8.0.0
  • [main] Installer HostActivation/HostModel.ComHost Tests failing in coreclr x86/x64 windows/osx #86520
  • AssemblyLoadContext crash on linux during exception processing #81108
    Future
  • Annotate remaining runtime libraries for NativeAOT #75480
    8.0.0
  • Performance regressions from #74665 and #74777 #75157
    8.0.0
  • Have AreOptimizationsDisabled to go through DAC #89474
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #75909
    8.0.0
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations (.NET 8) #77032
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_PriorityQueue<Int32, Int32> #76887
    8.0.0
  • Configuration model binding skips entire objects when enum binding fails #89715
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: Regressions in System.Collections.Concurrent.IsEmpty<Int32> #88483
    8.0.0
  • System.ConsoleTests.Perf_Console.ResetColor #84225
    8.0.0
  • Unable to get EMSDK version when evaluating NativeFileReference in nuget package props or targets #61306
    8.0.0
  • Specify SizeConst when marshalling field as ByValArray #36134
    8.0.0
  • Test failure profiler/gc/nongcheap/nongcheap.sh #88507
    8.0.0
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in .NET 7 during GC #82753
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogMessagesTests.CanReadAndWriteMessages #88224
    8.0.0
  • Add JsonContent.Create overloads that accept JsonTypeInfo. #51544
    8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 #88099
    8.0.0
  • TestCallingConventions failing #81677
    8.0.0
  • Implement System.Math methods with Generic Math. #89721
  • [mono/wasm] regression in IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #89624
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support IEnumerable Visualizer when debugging on wasm #75552
    8.0.0
  • Unhandled exception while loading Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices #89553
  • A really obscure System.IO.Pipes issue that appeared on .NET 6 #89427
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Windows static library runtime build exports MONO_API functions. #89444
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT Windows - System.InvalidCastException: Specified cast is not valid #89672
  • JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Serialization/Deserialize/Deserialize.dll fails under gcstress on linux-arm64 #88618
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expressions size regression #89527
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Cleanly delineate runtime, and application arguments #85674
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success test #89748
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix COM object leak #89745
    area-System.DirectoryServices, 8.0.0
  • JIT: don't dead store untracked OSR locals based on ref count #89743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Http CI test #89742
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not pause on exceptions from our framework js files if JMC is enabled #89741
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Try to enable some JIT tests #89739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Run the tests in debug mode to get more information. #89737
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Utilize the new `ref readonly` language feature #89736
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable BinSkim scan in nightly validation #89728
    needs-area-label
  • [Mono] Fix rare deadlock during gcdump when using interp full AOT fallback. #89726
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono]: Fix iOS/Android sample diagnostics config. #89725
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Lsra JitStressRegs mode SpillAlways fixes #89720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Assure name starts with `icudt` + fix testing scenario. #89719
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • WIP: [mono] Support function pointer reflection introspection API #89712
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix RBO introducing data races #89710
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Debloat serialization guard #89706
    area-Serialization, size-reduction
  • WIP #89705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Remove hardcoded references to `net8.0` from WasmApp*targets #89699
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Superpmi collect asyncio fix #89663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Cleanup tool build changes #89738
    area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify test DLL lookup logic #89709
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Gather optimization info through the DAC #89534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move JsonSerializerOptions initialization logic to a shared helper. #89729
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Remove net7 nuget feeds #89460
    area-Infrastructure, needs-area-label
  • Fix MSB4120 warning in Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.props #89723
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] fix Write Barrier #89716
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Set VSTEST_TESTHOST_SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT to 2s #89703
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix nongcheap test #89711
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix typo in Calendar.cs #89717
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add ownership handle to IPC Eventpipe object #89486
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Create docs transport package and turn on extensions source of truth #89312
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add more meaningful assert message to PerformanceCounter test that fails intermittently in Win11 arm64 #89581
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • Fix EventLog test CanReadAndWriteMessages #89586
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Add JsonContent.Create overloads which accept JsonTypeInfo #89614
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add file-scoped class trimming test #89640
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Disable DllMap on mobile too #88333
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][aot] Prefer instances instead of using gsharedvt for types inf… #89688
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove physical promotion run (no longer needed) #89707
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update gcinfo for arm64 mrs instruction #89678
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary assignments of `MSBuildAllProjects`. #89684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix a bunch of DWARF errors #89488
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Properly implement `System.Linq.Expressions` substitutions according to the recent refactoring #89638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Fix Windows static build to not export MONO_API symbols. #89642
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] CI: Don't run chrome debugger tests on runtime-wasm if they #89658
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • Dynamic events #89371
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Flow binder gen diag locations correctly & pick up more bind input patterns #89537
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2233112 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/7.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89620
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89619
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add Info warning for int return values #89601
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Guaranteed unmarshal before managed call in unmanaged to managed stubs #89583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Rename area-ILVerification to area-Tools-ILVerification #89698
    area-Meta
  • Fix Globalization Invariant string comparisons with ordinal ignore casing #89660
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add [DebuggerGuidedStepThrough] to new invoker methods #89596
    area-System.Reflection, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #88884
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono] Fix more memory leaks in aot+interp mode. #89580
    needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Add FileAttributes.None #89130
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Stop using computed RID for RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER property #89598
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use latest ILC to AOT-compile ILC #89655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add MediaType to BinaryData #89605
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add package readme for obsolete .NET Standard 1.x packages #88911
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update (remove most) most of CLRTestKind, GenerateRunScript, RestorePackages #89696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 8.0.0
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Re-enabling eventlog tests to verify behavior #89644
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Use cgroup to calculate available memory #89682
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • preserve TargetHostName even if we do not send it out via SNI #89289
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Added ArrayBufferWriter<T>.ResetWrittenCount() #88009
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #89673
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix host debug view not showing services before start #89610
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add workaround for broken SPNEGO in IBM WebSphere #89268
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Specify callback calling convention for callbacks on Windows x86 causes crashes on Mono. #89571
    arch-x86, area-Interop-mono, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
